special_text:
[i]“Kill or be killed is the new rule, and it is the only rule that matters.”
–Magneto[/i]
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
You may exile a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lore counters on The Hunger Spreads from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types.
